availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William F. Moore (Louisa, Lawrence County merchant)

body.p: Louisa, Lawrence County merchant. Virginia native. Brother of Laban T. Moore. Married Margaret O’Brien Moore in 1854. Father of Hannah P. Moore and Frederick Moore. Partner in trade with N. D. Redhead. Sutler of the 14th Volunteer Kentucky Infantry Regiment, U.S.A.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1040. KYR-0001-004-1318. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Marriages, Lawrence County, 1854. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, p. 187. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, p. 2. “William Francis Moore,” Find A Grave, December 15, 2009, Memorial no. 45452316.
